title: Drawing, "Left Part of a Sketch of El Yemen Valley, Arabia:  Distant View", February 20, 1868
medium:
Recto: Graphite on gray paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at lower left: El Yemen.
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right: El [continues on 1917-4-178]
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a rock wall, the upper part of which looks  like a row of columns with a hillside visible in the right middleground.

Verso: Horizontal view of the left part of a representation of the valley as a distant view.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Left Part of a Sketch of El Yemen Valley, Arabia:  Distant View", February 20, 1868.
February 20, 1868. Recto: Graphite on gray paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-177.
